questionTitle: The defendant's family were present at the ________.
I don't ________ with your decision but I do think that you might have told me last week.
________ I lock the door for you?
Our car was badly ________ in the accident.
Do come ________ instead of standing there on the doorstep in the rain.
Everyone in the village ________ about the plans for the new road.
He ________ his friend to go camping with him.
Alistair: I'm in an awful mess here. Could you give me a hand? Alexander: Certainly. What needs ________?
I ________ my family very much when I'm away from home.
The ________ age of the population in most western countries is rising fast.
You can't get sleeping pills unless you go to the doctor and get a ________.
Driving a car with faulty brakes is ________ quite a risk.
The shop assistant apologized and said that they didn't have any of them ________ yet.
You really ________ have passed that exam: you obviously didn't work hard enough!
Sue hadn't seen her brother for thirty years and ________ they recognized each other instantly.
You ________ be exhausted after that walk.
The new pills are round, so they're easier to ________.
I had to be up early the next morning, so I ________ myself and left the party.
Do you ________ to go to the party?
We ________ the plumbers to install an extra radiator in the living-room.
